manifest:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:versionCode="63" android:versionName="3.2.1" package="com.amaze.filemanager">
	<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="14" android:targetSdkVersion="26" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_SHORTCUT" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.amaze.cloud.permission.ACCESS_PROVIDER" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.USE_FINGERPRINT" />
	<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.touchscreen" android:required="false" />
	<uses-feature android:name="android.software.leanback" android:required="false" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<application android:label="Amaze" android:icon="res/mipmap-mdpi-v4/ic_launcher.png" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.utils.application.AppConfig" android:debuggable="true" android:allowBackup="true" android:supportsRtl="true" android:banner="res/drawable-xxxhdpi-v4/about_header.png" android:roundIcon="res/mipmap-mdpi-v4/ic_launcher_round.png">
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f11019e" android:label="Amaze" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.activities.MainActivity" android:launchMode="singleInstance">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LEANBACK_LAUNCHER" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.GET_CONTENT" />
				<data android:mimeType="*/*" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.OPENABLE" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.RINGTONE_PICKER" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<data android:mimeType="application/zip" />
				<data android:mimeType="application/rar" />
				<data android:mimeType="application/x-gzip" />
				<data android:mimeType="application/x-rar-compressed" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.service.quicksettings.action.QS_TILE_PREFERENCES" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.BROWSABLE" />
				<data android:scheme="com.amaze.filemanager" />
				<data android:mimeType="resource/folder" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<data android:mimeType="resource/folder" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter android:label="Save as…">
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SEND" />
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SEND_MULTIPLE" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<data android:mimeType="*/*" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f11019e" android:label="Settings" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.activities.PreferencesActivity" android:uiOptions="0x1">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.APPLICATION_PREFERENCES" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f11019e" android:label="Text Reader" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.activities.TextEditorActivity">
			<intent-filter android:label="Amaze Text Editor">
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<data android:mimeType="text/*" />
				<data android:mimeType="application/javascript" />
				<data android:mimeType="application/json" />
				<data android:mimeType="application/xml" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f11019e" android:label="Database Reader" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.activities.DatabaseViewerActivity" android:screenOrientation="locked">
			<intent-filter android:label="Amaze Database Reader">
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<data android:mimeType="db/*" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f11019b" android:label="About" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.activities.AboutActivity" />
		<service android:label="Extracting" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.asynchronous.services.ExtractService" />
		<service android:label="Compressing" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.asynchronous.services.ZipService" />
		<service android:label="Copying" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.asynchronous.services.CopyService" />
		<service android:label="Encrypting" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.asynchronous.services.EncryptService" />
		<service android:label="Decrypting" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.asynchronous.services.DecryptService" />
		<service android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.asynchronous.services.ftp.FTPService" android:enabled="true" android:exported="true" />
		<service android:label="FTP Server" android:icon="res/drawable-xhdpi-v4/ic_ftp_dark.png" android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.asynchronous.services.ftp.FTPTileService" android:permission="android.permission.BIND_QUICK_SETTINGS_TILE">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.service.quicksettings.action.QS_TILE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</service>
		<receiver android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.asynchronous.services.ftp.FTPReceiver" android:exported="true">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.services.ftpservice.FTPReceiver.ACTION_START_FTPSERVER" />
				<action android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.services.ftpservice.FTPReceiver.ACTION_STOP_FTPSERVER" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
		<receiver android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.ui.notifications.FTPNotification" android:exported="true">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.services.ftpservice.FTPReceiver.FTPSERVER_STARTED" />
				<action android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.services.ftpservice.FTPReceiver.FTPSERVER_STOPPED" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
		<provider android:name="com.amaze.filemanager.utils.GenericFileProvider" android:exported="false" android:authorities="com.amaze.filemanager.FILE_PROVIDER" android:grantUriPermissions="true">
			<meta-data android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS" android:resource="res/xml/provider_paths.xml" />
		</provider>
		<service android:name="com.squareup.leakcanary.internal.HeapAnalyzerService" android:enabled="false" android:process=":leakcanary" />
		<service android:name="com.squareup.leakcanary.DisplayLeakService" android:enabled="false" android:process=":leakcanary" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f1101a4" android:label="Leaks" android:icon="res/drawable-mdpi-v4/leak_canary_icon.png" android:name="com.squareup.leakcanary.internal.DisplayLeakActivity" android:enabled="false" android:process=":leakcanary" android:taskAffinity="com.squareup.leakcanary.com.amaze.filemanager">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f1101a5" android:label="Storage permission" android:icon="res/drawable-mdpi-v4/leak_canary_icon.png" android:name="com.squareup.leakcanary.internal.RequestStoragePermissionActivity" android:enabled="false" android:process=":leakcanary" android:taskAffinity="com.squareup.leakcanary.com.amaze.filemanager" android:excludeFromRecents="true" />
		<meta-data android:name="android.support.VERSION" android:value="26.1.0" />
		<activity android:name="com.cloudrail.si.servicecode.commands.awaitCodeRedirect.AuthenticationActivity" />
		<activity android:name="com.mikepenz.aboutlibraries.ui.LibsActivity" />
	</application>
</manifest>
